snippet: The airstrike and the unrelated crash of an Israeli surveillance drone came amid an increase in cross-border violence that has threatened a cease-fire.
abstract: Israeli airstrike in southeast Gaza Strip kills three Palestinian militants who Israeli military says fired mortar at its soldiers patrolling near border; separately, Israeli surveillance drone crashes near border; incidents come amid uptick in cross-border violence over two months.

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: The airstrike and the unrelated crash of an Israeli surveillance drone came amid an increase in cross-border violence that has threatened a cease-fire.

headline.main: Amid Escalating Violence, Israeli Strike Kills 3 Militants in Gaza
headline.print_headline: Amid Escalating Violence, Israeli Strike Kills 3 Militants in Gaza
